phrases: It is finally the second semester...
I am not too sure if I feel happy or empty... it is a complicated feeling.
When you went to the human world, you did not stop by your home; was that all right?
Oh, if it is not Tsukune!
I heard you are on summer vacation, but when are you coming back?
I was nearby, but I decided not to come visit.
Well, if you are doing fine that is good...
Of course I am doing fine.
I have made lots of friends, entered the Newspaper Club, and cheerfully make newspapers with everybody...
Right from the start of the semester?!
Someday, Moka and I will graduate from this academy.
It is also possible that the human and monster worlds will become separated.
That is why I decided to make as many happy memories as I can while I am still here!
The summer vacation's first Youkai newspaper issue looks really good!
I think the girls will love the news article about the latest fashions of the human world!
Is not that article a little outdated?
But, this is worth all the effort we put in.
There is more content than usual too.
Shirayuki-san makes it sound like we are still strangers.
From now on, please call me Mizore-chan.
We still have not compiled as many issues as we were planning, so hurry up and get to work!
You are pretty into it, huh.
It is the newspaper that Tsukune and I made, right?
Before, when I first met you guys, I thought, what a weird bunch, but...
Anyways, was not the Human World great?
But now I think, This kind of thing is not so bad.
After seeing ganguros, I was thinking about trying it myself.
I think it is better if you do not use too much...
Then, let us pass out those newspapers before class!
Would you like a copy of Square?
Would you like a copy of Youkai Square?
All of the articles are very interesting and informative!
For our first issue, it is a special edition about the Human World!
Whoa, it was printed in color?
There are even pictures of models in swimsuits!
The latest fashion trends in the human world?
Tulip hats and trousers are in style now, huh?
Hey, what the heck is that?
Who gave you guys permission to hand out newspapers?
And unlike our newspaper club, this is not a legitimate club...
I am Keito, a second-year student.
The president of the Super Newspaper Club.
As an official club, I have already gotten approval from the school.
Since you guys were so boring, we were thinking of bringing in new journalism.
If you are frustrated, then compete with your content.
The distribution of the latest issue of Youkai Newspaper commences!
This is the latest issue of Youkai Newspaper!
It is a special edition about the Human World!
If you do not read it...
There is a special on the human world in this newspaper too?
Does not this seem kind of rehashed?
There are not any swimsuit models in this one!
With so many stiff news articles, it is so boring!
I did not think that a rival would appear...
Does the Super Newspaper Club really exist?
This was something that I only heard of yesterday.
But, I am surprised they got permission, since there is already a similar club.
In this situation, there is a belief that the less popular group should be abolished...
If that is the case, fine.
In other words, we just need to prove that we are more popular than the Super Newspaper Club, right?!
We have to talk to Gin-senpai first!
He is our president, after all.
Besides, he is probably taking pictures of girls changing again!
Which is exactly what he was doing.
Please read our latest, content-filled issue, master!
Ku-Kurumu-san, this outfit is too embarrassing!
We need to increase our Masters, I mean our readers.
Now, for all the Masters of the Youkai Newspaper here,
You will get homemade cookies from me, Kuruno Kurumu!
Who is the best newspaper in the school?
If you subscribe now, we will give you our secret unprocessed pictures as a present!
Please do not use them for strange reasons, okay?
Wearing swimsuits in school is not something you normally see, but that is fine with me!
Forget'legitimate', they are actually doing it!
Everyone, who is the most interesting newspaper?
Let us go with a more embarrassing outfit...
I think your flat chest is so much better than the swimsuits...
Yukari-chan, do not be discouraged... we are distributing in front of the school next!
We are still going to distribute them?
This time, we will wear swimsuits too, and fairly revealing ones at that!
In the end, things were looking bad, so we talked to Gin-senpai...
Nothing will happen if you compete with them.
But our opponents are just idiots running around in swimsuits!
And you were planning to do the same thing yourself...
Those guys... are backed by the Public Safety Commission.
In a word, they are a more violent version of a morality police.
In order to protect the peace of the school, a militant group was made to control evil activities.
That is the school's police force: the Public Safety Commission.
We have not done anything wrong...
It is a common occurrence, but because of their power, they have started becoming corrupt.
The commission now is just a bunch of violent thugs that collect money and tributes from others.
To think that something that crazy is happening within the school...
This incident is also probably because we have slowly become popular and become an eyesore to them.
If these people are doing bad things, then is not it the duty for our Newspaper Club to reveal it?
We just need to write a bunch of articles against them!
There is no use in just chatting away!
I will leave the rest to you.
That is something I cannot accept!
This is an official decision of the Newspaper Club.
There is some left, I will go get them.
Even though we did our best making these...
I wonder what is going to happen to our Newspaper Club?
These newspapers... let us go distribute them now.
But, we cannot disobey Gin-senpai's decision-
Because these newspapers are like treasures to me.
It is the first thing that you and I made together.
They are still planning on distributing their shitty newspapers!
For a shitty contentless newspapers, it is pretty lightweight.
Hey, why are you guys doing-
Tell us; why are you guys harassing our Newspaper Club?
I guess you guys did not hear anything from Morioka Ginei.
Anyway, your little Newspaper Club is finished.
Who do you think you are talking to?
Well known in Japan since ancient times, it is a giant spider monster that takes the form of a woman.
So you finally showed your true form!
It seems that the only thing you are good at is finding dull material, Newspaper Club member-san.
To uphold our school's moral code as a guardian of justice.
This is our Public Safety Commission's badge of pride!
You guys are nothing but a bunch of thugs!
Are not you talking about yourselves there?
You are now just a pitiful prey for our Onee-sama!
These girls used to be members of clubs that opposed us!
I am from the Boring Literature club!
I am from the Tea Ceremony Club!
And I am from the Yaoi Manga Club!
But, I injected my spider poison into them, and they have become my loyal servants!
I will inject my wonderful spider poison into you too!
The voice of a trapped prey in despair!
An ugly spider woman laughing with her mouth wide open.
I told you to call me Mizore-chan, remember?
Calling me, a Jorougumo, a mere spider woman!
Once the rosary on her chest is removed,
the Vampire blood within Moka will awaken.
What is this tremendous monster energy?!
Hurry and do something about this!
If you really want to protect the Newspaper Club, then do something about it yourself.
If I was actually serious here...
I will not let you go!
We will not let you escape!
Was that good enough for you?
Do not get cocky, you brats!
That low ability of yours is no match for our Public Safety Commission's President, Kuyou-sama!
You guys will be trapped by my spider web!
Pull, and pull, and tap tap tap.
If you like spider thread so much, you should stay buried in there the rest of your life.
This match, including the singing, was decided in 117 seconds!
This might be against Gin-senpai's wishes, but...
As part of the Newspaper Club, I want to reveal every evil action of the Public Safety Commission in an article!
Even if everyone is against it...
Let us show them how the Newspaper Club fights!
As expected of the powers from a vampire, huh?
Do not tell me that they do not remember what happened last year...
It looks like I will be able to enjoy a good show for a change.
It is time to show our powers as the Newspaper Club!
Wait, this is bad, Tsukune is...!
He got all dried out from having his blood sucked.
Next time, Public Safety Commission and A Vampire
Let me suck on you next week too desu
